title: I was charged multiple times when I bought load on GCash. What do I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [I can’t buy load using GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30280703379353-I-can-t-buy-load-using-GCash-What-do-I-do)
- [I didn't receive my telco or non-telco load. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281038586649-I-didn-t-receive-my-telco-or-non-telco-load-What-do-I-do)
- [I bought load on GCash but entered the wrong number or details. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281882432281-I-bought-load-on-GCash-but-entered-the-wrong-number-or-details-What-do-I-do)
- [I received the wrong or incomplete load credit. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281354419865-I-received-the-wrong-or-incomplete-load-credit-What-do-I-do)
- [I was charged multiple times when I bought load on GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281393343769-I-was-charged-multiple-times-when-I-bought-load-on-GCash-What-do-I-do)
- [The E-PIN I bought from GCash was invalid. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281453006745-The-E-PIN-I-bought-from-GCash-was-invalid-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

You may have been charged multiple times for your telco or non-telco load because of system downtime or accidentally making the purchase more than once.

### **If there is a system downtime**

Your refund will be credited to your GCash wallet **within 2 business days**. You will also receive an SMS notifying you of this.

### **If you accidentally made multiple purchases**

If the purchase has been completed, GCash won’t be able to refund you for your transaction.

### **Tips before making a load purchase**

- Check your GCash wallet balance first
- Wait up to **5 minutes** for your Buy Load transaction to be processed
- Ensure you have a stable internet connection before purchasing
- Review your [GCash Transaction History](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034155433-How-do-I-view-and-download-my-GCash-transaction-history)

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [I can’t buy load using GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30280703379353)
- [I didn’t receive my telco or non-telco load. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281038586649)
- [I bought load on GCash but entered the wrong number or details. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30281882432281)
